thread.title: Christopher Whiting
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Christopher Whiting

author: Christopher Whiting
title: Christopher Whiting
text: Finally decided to upgrade and pay for Driver Support to optimize my PC having bought a new Samsung phone and found that was also out of date with Drivers After receiving my activation key My PC and phone were updated and optimized within 30 minutes. I do not know Why? I did not make the purchase earlier. Now any out of date Drivers will automatically be installed and PC up to date and operate with more efficiency.
